00022 #include "cimunit_barrier.h"

00024 #include <stdlib.h>

00027 int cimunit_barrier_init(cimunit_barrier_t *barrier)
00028 {
00029     cimunit_mutex_init(&barrier->mutex, NULL);
00030 
00031     // Create a counting semaphore with an initial value of 0.
00032     barrier->cond = semCCreate(0, 0);
00033 
00034     barrier->is_locked = TRUE;
00035     return 0;
00036 }
00037 
00038 
00039 int cimunit_barrier_destroy(cimunit_barrier_t *barrier)
00040 {
00041     semDelete(barrier->cond);
00042     cimunit_mutex_destroy(&barrier->mutex);
00044    return 0;
00045 }
00046 
00047 
00048 void cimunit_barrier_wait(cimunit_barrier_t *barrier)
00049 {
00050     semTake(barrier->cond, WAIT_FOREVER);
00051     cimunit_mutex_lock(&barrier->mutex);
00052     if (!barrier->is_locked)
00053     {
00054         // Let the next thread in line pass the barrier
00055         semGive(barrier->cond);
00056     }
00057     cimunit_mutex_unlock(&barrier->mutex);
00058 }
00059 
00060 
00061 void cimunit_barrier_unlock(cimunit_barrier_t *barrier)
00062 {
00063     cimunit_mutex_lock(&barrier->mutex);
00064     if (barrier->is_locked)
00065     {
00066         barrier->is_locked = FALSE;
00067         semGive(barrier->cond);
00068     }
00069     cimunit_mutex_unlock(&barrier->mutex);
00070 }
00071 
00072 
00073 void cimunit_barrier_lock(cimunit_barrier_t *barrier)
00074 {
00075     cimunit_mutex_lock(&barrier->mutex);
00076     barrier->is_locked = TRUE;
00077     cimunit_mutex_unlock(&barrier->mutex);                    
00078 }
